game.name: A Game About Feeding A Black Hole
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 소행성, 행성, 별을 파괴하여 블랙홀에 물질을 공급하는 짧은 방치형 게임.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A short incremental game about feeding a Black Hole matter by destroying Asteroids, Planets, and Stars.

reviewHighlights.text: Its cute, a sorta ok time waster, but it just doesn't feel satisfying. The tech tree, even tho its laid out branch style, is extremely linear due to i...
This is an early access game in disguise. The upgrade path is effectively forced, to the point where it might as well be automated. The main game mode...
